definition: various genera of flowers of Asteracea family (daisies and chrysanthemums), including Atractylis lancea

sentences.english: Obama said in Egypt that we have the right to nuclear technology.
sentences.chinese: 奧巴馬在埃及說過我們有權利使用核技術。

sentences.english: Development of advanced nuclear and clean coal technologies is essential, he said.
sentences.chinese: 他說，研發先進核技術和潔淨煤技術是極其重要的。

sentences.english: Not to mention Iran’s right to otherwise suspect nuclear technology.
sentences.chinese: 更不用說伊朗核技術那令人起疑的來歷。

sentences.english: This monitoring experiment of the water quality of the Panlongjiang River was conducted by using the Tradescantia MCN test.
sentences.chinese: 應用紫露草微核技術對盤龍江水質進行監測。

sentences.english: Conclusion The MCN test technology can be used to monitor environmental pollut…
sentences.chinese: 結論運用徽核技術可以檢測重金屬環境污染物。
